content.question: Weberâ€™s argument linking Fascism and Jacobinism implies that he was influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: Marxist materialist analysis of social change and historical development
Social Darwinist belief in the importance of struggle in historical progress
Positivist emphasis on the role of technology in shaping human affairs
Postmodernist subjectivist critiques of the ethos of Western society

content.answer: Marxist materialist analysis of social change and historical development

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
